name: Call of do Tio
description:
Project of a shooting game in the Call of Duty style, and in the end I ended up dedicating myself to it for almost 6 months.

The game became an online multiplayer FPS on an island, with:

  • 5 varieties of weapons with different sights
  • Functional minimap (players nearby shooting are revealed)
  • Perk reward system
  • Random weapons spawn across the scene
  • Possibility of melee attacks
  • Damage proportional to the affected body part
  • Damage reduction with firing distance

I'd like to thank my many friends who helped me test all versions of the game and encouraged me to keep creating content for the game, as without your support, maybe I wouldn't have made it that far.
